title: Feel like I am passing wind when I am praying, sometimes I hear sounds, is my prayer valid? assim
transcript: ABD from Pakistan so sh I have this problem whenever I stand up to pray the Salah I feel like that I'm passing wind uh and I hear small sounds but when I am not praying there's no sound so I'm not sure whether these are Whispers of Shan or I have a problem are you sure that this is passing wind or you're still doubtful uh I'm not uh 100% sure I'm ignore itas ignore it and continue to pray
